title: Event
description: Schema for Event entity type-specific fields

date.description: Date of the event (in-world calendar date)

era.description: Historical era or age when event occurred

event_type.description: Type of event (e.g., Battle, Treaty, Coronation, Disaster)

location_id.description: Reference to Location entity where event occurred

participant_ids.description: References to Character entities who participated

outcome.description: Result or outcome of the event
